summary: Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the Crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people.
cast: Martin Hancock|Michael Sheen|Nathalie Cox|Eriq Ebouaney|Jouko Ahola|David Thewlis|Liam Neeson|Philip Glenister|Orlando Bloom|Bronson Webb|Kevin McKidd|Nikolaj Coster-Waldau|Steven Robertson|Marton Csokas|Alexander Siddig|Velibor Topic|Michael Shaeffer|Eva Green|Brendan Gleeson|Nasser Memarzia|Jeremy Irons|Jon Finch|Edward Norton|Lotfi Yahya Jedidi|Samira Draa|Ulrich Thomsen|Matthew Rutherford|Michael Fitzgerald|Ghassan Massoud|Khaled Nabawy|Karim Saleh|Shane Attwooll|Giannina Facio|Emilio Doorgasingh|Peter Cant|Angus Wright|Iain Glen|Tim Barlow|Paul Brightwell|Peter Copley|Alex O'Dogherty|Bill Paterson|Robert Pugh|Alfonso Sánchez|Ángel Andrés|Christian Boeving|Alex Revan|Alex Twidale|Juan José Videgain
title: El reino de los cielos
